Title: Coding4Fun Laser Tag
Description: Ever want to do some cool effects with lasers?  This Coding4Fun project by Jeremiah Morrill shows how to leverage WPF and XNA to create a Laser Graffiti System.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Ever want to do some cool effects with lasers? This Coding4Fun project by Jeremiah Morrill shows how to leverage WPF and XNA to create a Laser Graffiti System.

To find out how this application was built, head over to the C4F blog! http://blogs.msdn.com/b/coding4fun/archive/2010/07/23/10042066.aspx
